verbs.description: rod stewart reschedules [V: kansas] [ARG1: city show] for october 16 illness has forced rod stewart to reschedule tuesday night concert with guest cyndi lauper for a date in october a news release says that stewart is recovering from strep throat and will also force him to postpone a show in minnesota he 'll now perform at the sprint center on university of minnesota cyndi lauper kansas city missouri sprint center rod stewart kansas city streptococcal pharyngitis
